definitions: a performance of a piece of music or drama

examples.text: her fine rendering of “Che farò senza Eurydice” was enough to win her strong commendation

shortDefinitions: performance of piece of music or drama

examples.text: a literal rendering of an idiom

definitions: a work of visual art, especially a detailed architectural drawing

examples.text: a consummately lifelike three-dimensional rendering of a building interior

definitions: the processing of an outline image using color and shading to make it appear solid and three-dimensional.
shortDefinitions: processing of outline image using colour and shading to make it appear solid and three-dimensional

definitions: the action of applying plaster to a wall

examples.text: the walls are capped and ready for rendering

shortDefinitions: action of applying plaster to wall

definitions: the plaster applied to a wall

examples.text: the walls can be of rendering, timber, or stone

shortDefinitions: coating of plaster applied to wall

definitions: the action of giving, yielding, or surrendering something
shortDefinitions: action of giving or surrendering something
